about_the_game:
It was once a peaceful time in the Shadowlands, but no more. A malevolent force has unleashed a horde of monsters on the lands, terrorising the population.

As a brave and skilled Shadow, you'll traverse forests, dark and dreary caves, and complex dungeons, facing off against hordes of fearsome monsters such as goblins, skeletons, and other creatures that lurk in the darkness. Utilise your agility and combat prowess to overcome challenging obstacles, solve the occasional puzzle, and vanquish relentless foes. Master an arsenal of powerful weapons and abilities to defeat enemies.

Key Features


  • Expansive Worlds: Explore beautifully crafted environments filled with interactables and NPCs. Search for hidden loot and trade with merchants to give you an edge in battle.
  • Combat: Engage in fast-paced action against a diverse range of enemies, each with unique attack patterns.
  • Platforming Adventure: Navigate through platforming challenges that test your agility and skill.
  • Skill Upgrades: Spen your skill points to unlock powerful abilities to enhance your combat prowess and traversal skills and upgrade your character's stats.

Are you ready to step into the shadows and conquer the monsters that await? Prepare for an unforgettable adventure in "Shadows And Monsters," where only the bravest will survive!

  • OS: Windows 10/11

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM

short_description: The minions of Evil have swept across the Shadowlands! Embark on a thrilling journey in this action-adventure platformer that combines intense combat with exploration and engage in dialogue and trade with cheeky NPCs.
